posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have for sale a T206 Bridwell (Cap)

This is a nice card. Take a look for yourself.

The price for the card is now $28 if you use PayPal F & F; $30 if you use regular PayPal with fees.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/06-054.html"][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-054t.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Click on the picture to look at a larger scan of the front and back of the card.

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back.
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board.
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy
The price of the card has been lowered.
